verses.name: Joel 2:30
verses.text: And I will shew wonders in the heavens and in the earth, blood, and fire, and pillars of smoke.

verses.name: Joel 2:31
verses.text: The sun shall be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before the great and the terrible day of the Lord come.

verses.name: Joel 2:32
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be delivered: for in mount Zion and in Jerusalem shall be deliverance, as the Lord hath said, and in the remnant whom the Lord shall call.
